member.name: T:Boolware.ColumnInfoEx
member.summary: Holds meta-data with extra index settings in flag2 information about one column. See class ColumnFlagValues for flag and flag2 values

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfoEx.name
member.summary: Column name

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfoEx.flags
member.summary:
Boolware indexing flags. Values are:
0x1 - String indexing
0x2 - Word indexing
0x4 - Phonetic words
0x8 - Proximity search
0x10 - Similarity search
0x20 - Left truncated search
0x40 - Proximity within line
0x80 - Normalize string (compress)
0x100 - Word permutations
0x200 - Stemmed words
0x400 - Grouped keys (fast interval)
0x800 - Rankable column
0x1000 - Categorization field
0x10000 - Index with field ID
0x20000 - Table global free text index
0x40000 - Alias field
0x100000 - Field contains markup elements
0x200000 - Field uses stop words
0x1000000 - Foreign key
0x2000000 - XML content column
0x4000000 - XML subfield (part of XML content column)
0x8000000 - Computed (virtual) column

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfoEx.flags2
member.summary:
Boolware indexing flags2. Values are:
0x00000001 - Field is Geoposition; Lat or Long, WGS84 format
0x00000002 - Field is Meter format like RT90
0x00000004 - Field contains both Long/Lat in same field
0x00000010 - Field is exact Word
0x00000020 - Field is exact String

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfoEx.size
member.summary: Maximum size of this column

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfoEx.type
member.summary: ODBC coded data type

member.summary: If part of primary key, sequence number

member.summary: Number of decimals

member.name: T:Boolware.Client
member.summary: This is the Boolware .NET client class. It exposes the Boolware API for a managed .NET application. Create an instance of this class, connect it with a Boolware server and then use the methods of this class to query the database, fetch tuples etc.

2 - offline
3 - pending
4 - read only

member.name: T:Boolware.ColumnInfo
member.summary: Holds meta-data information about one column. See class ColumnFlagValues for flag values

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfo.name
member.summary: Column name

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfo.flags
member.summary:
Boolware indexing flags. Values are:
0x1 - String indexing
0x2 - Word indexing
0x4 - Phonetic words
0x8 - Proximity search
0x10 - Similarity search
0x20 - Left truncated search
0x40 - Proximity within line
0x80 - Normalize string (compress)
0x100 - Word permutations
0x200 - Stemmed words
0x400 - Grouped keys (fast interval)
0x800 - Rankable column
0x1000 - Categorization field
0x10000 - Index with field ID
0x20000 - Table global free text index
0x40000 - Alias field
0x100000 - Field contains markup elements
0x200000 - Field uses stop words
0x1000000 - Foreign key
0x2000000 - XML content column
0x4000000 - XML subfield (part of XML content column)
0x8000000 - Computed (virtual) column

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfo.size
member.summary: Maximum size of this column

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfo.type
member.summary: ODBC coded data type

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfo.primaryKeySequence
member.summary: If part of primary key, sequence number

member.name: F:Boolware.ColumnInfo.decimalCount
member.summary: Number of decimals

member.name: T:Boolware.CounterAttribute
member.summary: class CounterAttribute contains the total accumulated value, the highest and lowest values. It also contains a descriptive counter name

member.summary: name of the counter

member.name: F:Boolware.CounterAttribute.accumulated
member.summary:
The accumulated value for the counter Depending on the counter type this value contains:
counter type is ct_XMLREQUESTS - number of xml performed requests
counter type is ct_BOOLEANQUERIES - number of hits for boolean queries
counter type is ct_SIMQUERIES - number of hits for similarity queries
counter type is ct_DATAFETCH - number of tuples fetched
counter type is ct_INDEXTERMS - number of index terms fetched
counter type is ct_SORTINGS - number of tuples sorted
